descriptionMarkdown:
## Overview
An automated request system for trains. Detects the contents of the train when it stops, and requests those items from the logistics network to add to the train contents. This way, a sample wagon can be filled, and the other wagon will be filled to match it.

## Uses
1. Set it up in your mall, and have different building trains stop at it to refill with specific materials
2. Request the items needed for a specific recipe to ship to assemblers

## How it works
1. When the train stops, get a snapshot of the initial contents and save it in a memory cell.
2. Multiply the initial contents by 2 to get the target contents (can modify this to request more)
3. Combine the target contents with -1 times the current contents to get the difference.
4. Set the stack inserter filter, stack size and chest requests in two stages:
   1. Bulk fill: for all items that needs at least 12 more, request the amount needed, set the stack inserter filter to only grab those items, and set the stack size to 12. This will fill more quickly
   2. Top off: once there are no items that need at least 12, request all the remaining items, set the stack inserter filter, and set the stack size to 1. This is needed so that the inserter doesn't try to put too many of an item into the wagon, which could make it get stuck.
5. When the amount needed goes down to 0, send the green signal to the train so that it can go.
6. Once the train leaves, reset the memory cell, and remove any extra items from the requester chest, sending them back to the network.
title: Automated train fill request station
